body.transcript:
Hello, thank you for calling Harmonious Sounds Music School. My name is Jose Martin. May I have your name, please?

It's Michelle Bell, and I'm really upset right now.

I'm sorry to hear that, Michelle. I'll do my best to assist you. Could you please tell me what seems to be the problem?

I've been charged for classes I never signed up for!

I apologize for the inconvenience, Michelle. In order to resolve this, could you please provide me with your account number?

Why do you need that? It feels like you guys are just trying to rip me off.

I understand your frustration, Michelle. I need your account number to verify and access your records to correct this issue. Could you please provide it?

Fine, it's one two three four five.

Thank you, Michelle. Could you also confirm the email address associated with your account?

It's michelle.bell@email.com. I hope this gets resolved quickly.

Thank you for providing the information, Michelle. I assure you I will look into this matter immediately. Thank you for your patience and understanding. Have a great day.
